references.paper_title: AMP: Adversarial motion priors for stylized physics-based character control
references.reason: This paper's character model design heavily influenced the design of the presented paper's simulated character.

references.paper_title: Isaac gym: High performance gpu-based physics simulation for robot learning
references.reason: This paper is cited because the Isaac Gym environment is used for physics simulation.
This paper is cited because it describes the transformer encoder architecture that TokenHSI uses.

references.paper_title: Trace and pace: Controllable pedestrian animation via guided trajectory diffusion
references.reason: This paper is cited because the early termination condition for the path-following task is adopted from it.

references.paper_title: Adaptnet: Policy adaptation for physics-based character control
references.reason: This paper is cited because it represents state-of-the-art policy adaptation for character control and is directly compared against in the experiments.
